summary: This document is the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York daily lieutenant's log for July 7, 2019, covering three shifts (Morning, Day, and Evening Watch). It records routine facility operations, counts, and security checks. The log notes inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg #76318-054) was in the facility and was moved within the Special Housing Unit (SHU) during the evening shift.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054. The log records him being moved within the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at 7:20 PM during the Evening Watch shift.

persons.name: Williams
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76319-054. The log records him as a '+1 self-surrender' at 3:21 AM during the Morning Watch shift.

events.title: Epstein Moved Within SHU
events.description: At 7:20 PM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was moved within the Special Housing Unit (SHU), noted as 'removed EN to ZA'.

keyFacts: This log confirms Jeffrey Epstein (Reg #76318-054) was incarcerated at the MCC New York on July 7, 2019.
Epstein was housed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and was moved within it at 7:20 PM.
The log indicates one inmate (Epstein) was at a local hospital under guard by the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS).
The document is a routine administrative log showing standard prison operations, counts, and security checks for the date.
